titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide comparable unrelated business taxable income treatment to tax exempt organizations which hold interests in S corporations to the treatment as is provided to such organizations for interests held in partnerships.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/6/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require tax exempt organizations to treat unrelated business taxable S corporation income in the same manner as unrelated business taxable partnership income.
